msg: The start of the template tag library

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a "targets" target that lists the Ant targets useful to developers.

author: craigmcc
msg: When processing an ActionForward that redirects, treat any path that begins
with "/" as context-relative.  (Same patch applied on the 1.0 tree).

author: craigmcc
msg: When processing an ActionForward that redirects, treat any path that begins
with "/" as context-relative.  This allows the same path values to be used for
either redirects or forwards.  Redirects to paths that do not start with "/"
are used unmodified (for example, a redirect to an absolute URL).
(This fix will also be applied to the 0.5 code base).

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a note that you must download the "optional.jar" file along with Ant 1.1
to get the implementation of the <style> task.
